description:
My place is close to St John's University: Queens Campus
Near by public transportation, 20 min ride with Express bus to Manhattan, local bus will take you to the E, F trains.
In addition Dunkin Donuts, 7-eleven and delicious deli are open 24/7. You’ll love my place because of very clean,the comfy bed, the coziness, the kitchen, very quiet area! Free parking on the street place is good for couples. It's a basement apartment with private entrance.

Basement apartment

Bus Q46, express bus to Manhattan QM5 and QM6
name: Entire Private floor, 10 min to JFK& 10 min to LGA
review: Albert's place looks exactly like the pictures. It's like living in a luxury apartment. The place has every amenity you can think of, and even a few you wouldn't dream of (heated floors!!) Even with the close proximity to a college campus, It's still a very quiet getaway. This is the perfect place for a couple, and I would definately book again. Thanks for having us Albert!
